Overview.today_12:
aaPanel provides you with enoughemail delivery quota for daily use. 
If you exceed the limit, you will need topurchase the pro license or expansion pack. 
Free Edition: 20000 per month 
Pro Edition: 120000 per month
Overview.today_13:
aaPanel provides you with enoughemail delivery quota for daily use. 
If you exceed the limit, you will need topurchase the pro license or expansion pack. 
150000 per month: $50 
2000000 per year: $288
